original_text: So the king began to check. His men led a servant to him who had a big debt. He must pay back 10,000 gold coins to the king.
korean_text: 결산할 때에 만 달란트 빚진 자 하나를 데려오매

sentences.original_text: So the king began to check.
His men led a servant to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 사람들이 한 종을 그에게 데려왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He must pay back 10,000 gold coins to the king.
